snippet.title: Amber Heard Exposed After Leaked LAPD Footage Surfaced…
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Exposed After Leaked LAPD Footage…

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT 👇

How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career

https://youtu.be/gEfWUbRfFR8

Related videos:

Body Cam Footage PROVING Amber Heard LIED about Johnny Depp!

https://youtu.be/dEhhgg43AiI

Amber Heard OFFICIALLY Faces 4 Years In PRISON For Lying In Court...

https://youtu.be/dEhhgg43AiI

The FBI Is Coming For Amber Heard - BREAKING! - Justice (Finally?!) For Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/QR9_W4jVEcQ

The various court cases involving Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been all
over the news over the last several months and still it is unclear who's right and
who's wrong. But this time there's never-seen-before evidence: body cam
footage from the Los Angeles police department (LAPD) officers who
responded to the 911 call and this evidence seems to change the compilation of
the case.
Make sure you stay till the end to see the final downfall of Amber Heard. This
time she is exposed for real. So, what was on the bodycam footage and why it
could change the whole case.
Nobody expected this was coming but Johnny Depp's attorneys claim that
never-before-seen body cam footage from the Los Angeles police department
(LAPD) officers who responded to the second of two 911 calls proves that
Johnny Depp did not have the violent altercation with his ex-wife! Moreover, it
proves that Amber Heard lied about the alleged brawl that took place in May
2016.
However, it's not the first time that Amber Heard lied. Let’s look back at the
following things: donating the entirety of the divorce settlement money to a
children’s charity, an abuse story that she stole from her former colleague, the
‘dogs story’, never hitting Johnny Depp, and many other things. Amber Heard
lied about all of these things while under oath in the UK high courts. Now
there’s even more evidence that she lied.
And now, ahead of Johnny Depp's upcoming $50 million defamation lawsuit
against his ex-wife, which will take place in Virginia in April 2022, the actor's
lawyers are revealing depositions from the officers and body camera footage
from them and the attorneys are claiming that cops do not support Amber
Heard's allegations.
Giving testimony, Amber Heard claimed that Johnny Depp hit her in the face
with a phone and tore out clumps of her hair in an extended altercation that took
place throughout their shared home at the time. Amber Heard and her friend,
Rocky Pennington, both gave depositions about the incident and each of them

described the scene as a violent mess. Rocky Pennington described it as, "They
have a big kitchen island in the middle of the kitchen and on there, there's
candles and like fruit and, you know, glass, like jars and vases and things like
that. And he just was hitting everything with the wine bottle, just smashing it all
off. So there was fruit on the floor and baskets and, you know, glass bottles and
flowers."
Amber Heard's description was, "We have huge heavy silver candlesticks,
candelabra sticks. Those were on the floor broken. Baskets of fruit that we had
on the kitchen island. There ... fruit everywhere. Baskets on the ground. The
containers holding the spoons and forks, kitchen utensils, those were spilled. He
broke a lot of glass things that left glass on the floor ... when he walked out into
the hallway, you could see wine spilled all over the ground and wine on the
walls and ... and so I knew that at least he had gone through there and was like
sloshing wine anywhere."
Right now we have a chance to take a look at what really happened that night!
...
And now I want to know your opinion of the matter. Do you think this evidence
will help Johnny Depp to prove that he is not the ab*ser? And do you think
Amber Heard will continue to put up the fight? Let me know your opinion in the
comments section down below and make sure you hit the subscribe button.

Binge Watch - Binge Watch is the best source of the latest celebrity news. Want to see what's trending today in the Hollywood life or hear about the newest celeb gossip? You're in the right place. 

Consider subscribing to not miss out on what's trending today in the life of the world's biggest stars.

#JusticeForJohnnyDepp #news #BingeWatch
